name: The Computer
description:
You click the keyboard to wake up the computer. Four seconds and it's ready.
You head to onehourgamejam.com to get the theme.
Good, it has just been revealed: 'Text Based / Text For Graphics'.
You open your favorite code editor and start creating a game about:

options.text: A game developer participating on an one-hour game jam
A MUD based on random ideas from MUDs you've played
An arcade game where you break candy for the mega-bonus
A turn-based strategy game where you wage war on heaven.
A shooting game where you ride bikes with zombies with guns
A tycoon game where you copy-paste plants to make a business
